name: data-repository
description: Saves JSON object from HTTP POST request into relational database for reporting

scripts.cibuild: ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover --dir=build/coverage _mocha test/**/*.js -- -t 20000 -R xunit-file; mkdir -p build/report; mv xunit.xml build/report/TESTS-xunit.xml

author: Johan Le Lan <lelan-j@mgdis.fr>
